current_contact.agency: Washoe Cnty Med Exam Coroners Ofc

case_address_found_1: N. side of the Truckee River, 1/4 mi. east of the Mustang Exit
case_circumstances: On 01/07/2008, a hunter was hunting on the south side of the Truckee River when he observed the decedent, located on the north side of the river, face-down in the water.  911 was called and emergency personnel responded to the scene.  The decedent had obvious signs of death and was declared dead.  The decedent was fully clad and was without identification.
case_head_hair: Long brown-grey pulled back into a small ponytail.

case_clothing_on_body: Flannel brown jacket, black hooded sweatshirt, green nylon "2000 Northern NV Golf Tournament jacket, brown "Orange County Choppers" t-shirt, blue denim trousers, and grey "US Airforce" sweatpants
case_other_items_with_body: Blenders Gold Nicaragua cigars, X7 AA batteries, fingernail clippers, chewing tobacco
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
